name: Cure Wounds
desc: `!cast cure <creature>` - Magically heal wounds of an injured kobold or creature, healing around 5 HP.

name: Regenerate
desc: `!cast regenerate <kobold>` - Magically restore lost flesh and bone. Regenerates body parts, and/or heals a large amount of HP.

name: Wellness
desc: `!cast wellness <kobold>` - Cures various diseases such as infection, poison, etc. Cures one per cast.

name: Energize
desc: `!cast energize <kobold>` - Infuse a kobold with energy, granting them 3 AP.

name: Transfusion
desc: `!cast transfusion <creature>` - Transfer around 5 HP from the caster to the target. Will not kill the caster.

name: Mage Armor
desc: `!cast armor <kobold>` - Grant the target +3 AC for one combat.

name: Recall
desc: `!cast recall` - Teleport the caster and their party back to their home tribe. Costs 1 mana per party member.

name: Message
desc: `!cast message <kobold> <msg>` - Send a message to a known kobold anywhere in the world.

name: Prospect
desc: `!cast prospect <mineral>` - Locate the nearest tile within 10 tiles containing a given resource.

name: Brace
desc: `!cast brace` - Fill cracks and faults in the local cavern with natural stone, increasing stability.

name: Gemsight
desc: `!cast gemsight <kobold>` - Grant Gemsight, which greatly increases the chance of finding gems when the target mines. Lasts until the end of the month.

name: Sex Change
desc: `!cast sex <kobold>` - Exactly what it says on the tin. Does not work on a pregnant kobold.

name: Chroma Shift
desc: `!cast chroma <kobold> <color>` - Changes the target's scale color and corresponding genomes. <color> is optional; if specified, you will consume gemstones of the specified color to change the target to that color. Does not affect stats.

name: Time Warp
desc: `!cast warp <kobold>` - Ages up the target kobold by 1 month.

name: Blood Scry
desc: `!cast scry <kobold>` - Drains a little of the target's blood (1 HP), but reveals their genomes.

name: Goodberry
desc: `!cast goodberry` - Creates at least 1 Goodberry, which can fill a kobold's stomach and give them 1 HP/AP.

name: Fireball
desc: `!cast fireball` - Causes a large explosion that burns all enemies, damaging them heavily.

name: Freeze Ray
desc: `!cast freeze <enemy>` - Cast a chilling ray at one enemy, damaging them heavily and preventing them from acting next round.

name: Force Bolt
desc: `!cast force <enemy>` - A basic bolt of magical force that damages a single enemy.

name: Decay
desc: `!cast decay <enemy>` - Causes organic matter to rot, dealing necrotic damage to a single enemy.

name: Smite
desc: `!cast smite <enemy>` - Summon the energy of the divine to strike an enemy. This is especially effective against undead.

name: Magic Missile
desc: `!cast missile <enemy>` - Fire a projectile of magical force that hones in on the target. It never misses and deals considerable damage.

name: Hotfix
desc: `!cast hotfix <item>` - Mends an item, restoring it to full durability, but from then on it will lose durability faster.

name: Mending
desc: `!cast mending <item>` - Mends an item, restoring at least 10 points of durability.

name: Enchant
desc: `!cast enchant <item>` - Fills an item with magical properties, increasing its quality by 1 level. The cap is based on your Intelligence and Sorcery skill.

name: Sparkle
desc: `!cast sparkle <enemy>` - Creates a blinding light that causes an enemy to obtain the Blinded status, which gives them disadvantage on attack rolls.

name: Pass Without Trace
desc: `!cast pass <kobold>` - Veil a companion in shadows and silence, giving them a massive bonus to stealth rolls until they engage in battle.

name: Invisibility
desc: `!cast invisibility <kobold>` - Make a target invisible. They are less likely to be targeted by attacks, receive a large boost to stealth, and attacks against them have disadvantage. Lasts until the target makes an attack.

name: Spectral Blade
desc: `!cast blade` - Create a Spectral Blade in your inventory, which can be used as a weapon for a while.

name: Spectral Bow
desc: `!cast bow` - Create a Spectral Bow and some Spectral Arrows in your inventory, which can be used as a weapon for a while.

name: Sleep
desc: `!cast sleep` - Attempt to put all enemies to sleep. A sleeping enemy cannot attack and cannot act against you if you flee. If all enemies are asleep, the combat ends.

name: Scout
desc: `!cast scout <direction>` - Look into a neighboring tile and get information about it, as well as any encounters there. Works through walls.

name: Charm
desc: `!cast charm <kobold>` - Charm a tribeless kobold, improving charisma rolls with them.

name: Grease
desc: `!cast grease` - Create puddles of grease under the enemies' feet, causing them to potentially slip and lose their turn. Also makes them vulnerable to fire damage.

name: Tiny Hut
desc: `!cast hut` - Create a magical camp on the current tile. It has no heat and will disappear at the end of the month.

name: Expeditious Retreat
desc: `!cast retreat <direction>` - Empower your allies with the incredible ability of getting the hell out of dodge. Flees a battle without dropping items or provoking opportunity attacks. Costs 1 mana per party member.

name: Rock Polish
desc: `!cast polish <kobold>` - Cause all stone pebbles in the target's inventory to appear as marble pebbles to other kobolds.

name: Tremor
desc: `!cast tremor` - Create a huge earthquake in the area, which reduces cavern stability but deals damage to all enemies. Does half damage if not underground.

name: Lifesteal
desc: `!cast lifesteal <enemy>` - Drain the life force of a target and add it to your own.

name: Blood Rupture
desc: `!cast rupture <enemy>` - Rot a vein-heavy portion of an enemy's skin, causing the vessel to burst. This will fill an empty container you have with blood.

name: Barrier
desc: `!cast barrier <kobold>` - Create a reflective barrier around the target, causing attackers to take a percentage of the damage they inflict.

name: Haste
desc: `!cast haste <kobold>` - Give an ally an extra action in combat for this round.

name: Shade
desc: `!cast shade <kobold>` - Give a kobold immunity to sunlight sensitivity for the rest of the month.

name: Condensate
desc: `!cast condensate <container>` - Create one unit of water and fill a targeted container with it.

name: Dislocate Earth
desc: `!cast dislocate <dir>` - Teleport a chunk of stone or another mineral out of the wall and to you, at the cost of some cavern stability.

name: Soulbind
desc: `!cast soulbind <item>` - Bind your soul to an item. You can only have one bound item at a time. Cast the spell without the <item> argument to teleport your bound item to you, no matter the distance between. Costs 10 mana to bind a new item, and 2 mana to summon it.

name: Regrowth
desc: `!cast regrowth` - Instantly sprouts some trees in the area. Must be cast on the surface.

name: Soothe Beast
desc: `!cast soothe <creature>` - Pacifies a hostile animal. The cost increases based on the CR of the animal.

name: Animal Friendship
desc: `!cast friendship <creature>` - Tames a non-hostile animal. The cost increases based on the CR of the animal.

name: Vine Whip
desc: `!cast whip <enemy>` - Thorny vines assault a single enemy.

name: Venom
desc: `!cast venom <enemy>` - Injects an enemy with a potent, quick-acting venom for moderate damage.

name: Entangle
desc: `!cast entangle <enemy>` - Entangles an enemy in thick roots and vines, stunning them.
